channel.title: Lots of errors in server console
channel.description:
While i'm running the server everything works fine until someone connects and i start getting LOTS of errors: [code] at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:402) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:394) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:265) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:34) at client.closeInterface(client.java:4208) at client.declineDuel(client.java:5534) at client.logout(client.java:8207) at item.title: Lots of errors in server console
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

someone is nulling your server? then it throws a nullpointexception?

Or you messed up somewhere

Read full topic
item.source: Lots of errors in server console

item.title: Lots of errors in server console
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Check your playerhandler.java and remove the stuff you edited and set it back to normal.
OR Do you use tabs or spaces? if you use spaces it will give you such errors. Use tabs
instead of space

Read full topic
item.source: Lots of errors in server console
